benefit.title: Benefits of Painting & Art
benefit.desc: Painting is not just about simple strokes ‚Äî it is the story of thoughtful souls

items.title: Connect, Listen, and Heal Together
items.desc: Painting allows your soul to rest, temporarily forget all the pressures, and feel each gentle breath. Every brushstroke becomes a moment of healing and inner peace.

items.title: Enhance Creativity
items.desc: Art opens up an endless space for imagination, where you can freely create and express yourself. Every color and every line becomes part of a journey of freedom and emotional healing.

items.title: Improve Observation and Focus
items.desc: When you paint, you learn to observe details and pay attention to light, colors, and shapes. This brings calmness to the mind, strengthens patience, and trains deep concentration for inner healing.

items.title: Beautify Your Living Space
items.desc: A painting created by your own hands does not only decorate your room but also spreads warmth and peace. Each artwork leaves a personal mark that makes your living space more lively and healing.

blog.post4.title: Healing Through Art ‚Äì From Darkness to Light
blog.post4.desc: Healing is not a one-day journey, but every brush stroke and every color slowly brings back energy, confidence, and hope.

footer.slogan: Every stroke is a story - Every artwork is a journey - Enjoy and create - For you

aboutPage.heroDesc: SnapArt is not just an art workshop ‚Äî it is an emotional journey where you can slow down in the rhythm of modern life, rediscover balance within yourself, and reconnect with your inner world through every stroke of color.

section1.title: Who We Are
section1.desc: We are a creative art studio born from a deep love for painting and a desire to spread positive values through art. At SnapArt, every artwork is not merely a creation, but a story, an emotion, and a personal imprint of the artist.

section2.title: What We Do
section2.desc: SnapArt offers a wide variety of art classes, workshops, and creative events for all ages ‚Äî from beginners to those with experience. We not only teach drawing techniques, but also inspire creativity and empower students to express their individuality and inner world with confidence.

section3.title: How We Support You
section3.desc: SnapArt is more than a place to learn how to draw; it is a healing space where you can release stress, balance your emotions, and rediscover joy in simple moments. Each workshop is a personal journey of self-discovery and emotional renewal through art.

section4.title: Creating Meaningful Stories
section4.desc: Every customer who comes to SnapArt carries a unique story, and when they leave, they take home more than just a painting ‚Äî they gain confidence, happiness, peace of mind, and unforgettable memories. These small stories are the greatest motivation that drives SnapArt forward.

aboutPage.endingDesc: If you are searching for a place to relax your mind, nurture your creativity, and connect with like-minded people, SnapArt is always ready to welcome you.

bannerAbout.title: Discover the Artist Within You
bannerAbout.desc: Every class at SnapArt is a journey of emotions, colors, and endless creativity.

workshopBanner.title: SnapArt Workshop
workshopBanner.subtitle: Explore, create, and heal through art

workshopAcrylic.title: üñå Acrylic Painting Workshop
workshopAcrylic.desc: A relaxing ‚Äì beginner-friendly ‚Äì colorful workshop for anyone who wants to try acrylic painting. You will be guided step-by-step to finish a beautiful artwork and take it home right after the session.
workshopAcrylic.introDesc1: This Acrylic workshop is designed to be simple, easy to follow, and perfect for beginners. You will learn basic acrylic techniques, brush handling, and color mixing.
workshopAcrylic.introDesc2: Our staff will guide you throughout the session so you can complete a well-composed artwork with a clear focal point. It‚Äôs a great way to relax, reduce stress, and enjoy art in a gentle way.
workshopAcrylic.fit1: Beginners who want to try acrylic painting
workshopAcrylic.fit2: Teens 14+ and adults who love art
workshopAcrylic.fit3: Friends, couples, or small weekend groups
workshopAcrylic.fit4: Anyone looking for a calm, no-pressure experience
workshopAcrylic.pricingDesc: Prices include all materials and full guidance during the workshop.
workshopAcrylic.note: * Message the fanpage to choose your size, style, and schedule.

workshopSand.title: üèñ Sand Paiting
workshopSand.desc: A gentle and relaxing workshop for beginners ‚Äî you will create a complete sand artwork with your own personal touch.
workshopSand.introDesc1: Sand art is a creative form made from layers of colored sand, combining composition and color blending to create beautiful gradient effects. This workshop lets you experience the full process from A to Z: choosing a design, mixing colors, preparing the base, layering sand, and finishing the artwork.
workshopSand.introDesc2: No prior drawing skills are required ‚Äî instructors guide you step by step, while staff assist with colors, composition, and framing so you can bring home a beautiful finished piece.
workshopSand.fit1: Beginners who want to explore art
workshopSand.fit4: People looking for a relaxing weekend activity
workshopSand.pricingDesc: Prices include all materials and full support during the workshop.
workshopSand.note: * Message our fanpage to choose frame, design, and schedule.

workshopTote.title: üëú Tote Bag Painting Workshop
workshopTote.desc: A relaxing creative workshop for beginners. You will be guided to plan your layout, mix colors, and finish a tote bag with your own personal style.
workshopTote.learn1: How to create ideas and choose a suitable concept
workshopTote.learn2: How to mix colors nicely on tote fabric
workshopTote.learn3: Basic painting techniques for clear and long-lasting artwork
workshopTote.learn4: How to take care of your tote after finishing
workshopTote.fitDesc: This workshop is perfect for students, office workers, and anyone who wants a relaxing weekend activity with friends or groups.
workshopTote.pricingDesc: The price includes all materials and full support during the workshop.
workshopTote.note: * Message our fanpage for concept suggestions and available schedules.

blog1.title: How to Use Paint Brushes Safely and Take Care of Them
blog1.intro: Paint brushes are essential tools for bringing creative ideas to life, from oil and acrylic painting to watercolor. However, improper use and storage can reduce the lifespan of your brushes and affect the quality of your artwork. Below are some helpful tips to use and maintain brushes effectively and safely.

section1.title: 1. Choose the right brush for the paint type

item1.text: Best for oil and acrylic paints, soft and excellent at holding paint.

item2.text: Suitable for watercolor and acrylic, easier to clean and generally more durable.

item3.bold: size and shape of the brush
item3.text2: based on your technique: round, flat, wide wash brushes, etc.

items.item1: Do not dip the brush too deeply into paint to avoid paint getting into the metal ferrule and handle.
items.item2: Hold the brush gently while painting. Avoid pressing too hard so the bristles don‚Äôt deform.
items.item3: Clean the brush immediately after painting to prevent paint from drying and damaging the bristles.

items.item1: Store brushes upright with bristles facing up or hang them horizontally to prevent bending.
items.item2: Avoid direct sunlight and humid environments.
items.item3: Use a dedicated brush cleaner for deep cleaning when needed.

blog2.title: Acrylic Paint: What It Is, How to Use and Store It
blog2.intro: Acrylic paint is a fast-drying, durable, and flexible water-based synthetic paint widely used in modern art. Thanks to its easy mixing, low toxicity, and ability to work on many surfaces, acrylic has become a popular choice for both beginners and professional artists.

items.item1: Acrylic paint is a water-based synthetic paint that dries quickly and can be diluted with water to create transparent effects.
items.item2: It can be used on paper, canvas, wood, fabric, and many other materials.
items.item3: It is colorfast and won‚Äôt fade over time if stored and used properly.

items.item1: Use brushes, paint pens, or a palette knife to create different effects.
items.item2: To adjust drying time and thickness, dilute with water or use a medium.
items.item3: Mix colors on a palette to create the tones you want.

items.item1: Close the lid tightly after use to prevent the paint from drying out.
items.item2: Store in a cool, dry place and avoid direct sunlight.
items.item3: Wash brushes immediately after use to keep them in good condition.

blog3.title: Painting With New Friends ‚Äì Why Not?
blog3.intro: Painting with friends not only helps you relieve stress, but also creates fun and inspiring artworks. Through group activities, everyone can learn skills, styles, and ideas from each other.

items.item3: Discover new techniques and color ideas from friends.

section2.title: 2. How to organize a group painting session

items.item1: Choose an open, well-lit space so everyone can paint comfortably.
items.item2: Each person brings their own supplies such as brushes, paints, paper, or canvas.
items.item3: Discuss ideas before starting to agree on a shared theme.

section3.title: 3. How to preserve your artwork after painting

items.item1: Let the painting dry completely before storing it.
items.item2: Use a frame or plastic cover to protect it from dust and direct sunlight.
items.item3: Keep it in a cool, dry place to preserve colors for a long time.
